module.name: ConfigFile
module.descr: The standard TIniFile has several flaw, so I provided my own implementation.

element.name: TConfigFile
element.descr: Implemented as a list of Sections, each containing lines of key=value. Entire sections can read or written without any interpretation.

element.name: TConfigFile.Create
element.short: Loads the given file, if it exists.

element.name: TConfigFile.WriteSection
element.short: Writes an entire section. Sets Dirty when the strings are different from the current section values.

element.name: TConfigFile.WriteSectionValues
element.short: Writes an entire section. Sets Dirty when the strings are different from the current section values.

element.name: TConfigFile.FindSection
element.short: Returns a Section object, specified as name or [name]. Nil if not found.

element.name: TConfigFile.SectionExists
element.short: Checks for a Section specified as name or [name].

element.name: TConfigFile.Flush
element.short: Saves the values if Dirty, and if FileName is not empty.
